projects.name: Falcon Eye
projects.description: is a synthetic vision and terrain-aware flight assistance system delivering real-time 3D perception for low-visibility aviation.
projects.longTitle: Falcon Eye delivers real-time synthetic vision for safe low-visibility flight.
projects.details: Falcon Eye reconstructs surrounding terrain and obstacles into a real-time 3D flight corridor, helping pilots maintain spatial awareness when visual cues are lost. The system is optimized for low-latency rendering on constrained hardware and prioritizes robustness, clarity, and pilot-first situational awareness.

projects.name: Ion
projects.description: is an AI-powered 3D hardware blueprinting system that auto-detects components, renders wiring in real time, and generates safe starter code.
projects.longTitle: Ion converts physical hardware into a live 3D blueprint with wiring and code generation.
projects.details: Ion detects microcontrollers and peripherals, infers connectivity, and renders a live wiring blueprint as hardware is assembled. It produces structured connection graphs, flags unsafe wiring patterns, and generates starter firmwareâ€”bridging the gap between bench prototypes and production-ready schematics.

projects.name: Siri++
projects.description: is a multimodal, agentic personal assistant that orchestrates workflows across apps using voice, images, and system context.
projects.longTitle: Siri++ executes real workflows using multimodal understanding and persistent context.
projects.details: Siri++ combines multimodal input (text, voice, images) with structured memory and tool execution to complete multi-step tasks across apps. It maintains continuity across sessions and focuses on end-to-end workflow completion rather than single-turn commands.

projects.name: Pulse
projects.description: is a disaster-resilient mesh-network and survivor-localization system designed to operate entirely offline.
projects.longTitle: Pulse enables offline mesh communication and survivor localization during disasters.
projects.details: Pulse forms an ad-hoc, offline-first mesh network that supports SOS messaging and location sharing when infrastructure fails. It prioritizes low-power operation, hop-by-hop reliability, and graceful degradation under extreme conditions.

projects.name: Shardwise
projects.description: is a distributed sharding and execution layer that decomposes large workloads into coordinated execution units.
projects.longTitle: Shardwise breaks large workloads into coordinated, scalable execution shards.
projects.details: Shardwise partitions compute into deterministic shards with explicit coordination and retry semantics. It is designed for predictable throughput under load, with visibility into shard-level latency and failure behavior.

projects.name: GhostPIN
projects.description: is a page-bound MFA system that prevents phishing and fake checkouts during online payments.
projects.longTitle: GhostPIN cryptographically binds payments to real merchant pages.
projects.details: GhostPIN secures online payments by binding user authentication to the actual merchant page rather than just the session. It combines server-signed visual nonces with adaptive MFA so transactions cannot be replayed on phishing or injected checkout pages, acting as a missing trust layer for web commerce.

projects.name: Flux
projects.description: is a real-time decision engine that recommends the optimal credit card or payment method for each purchase.
projects.longTitle: Flux optimizes payment decisions to maximize rewards and minimize lost value.
projects.details: Flux evaluates purchase context against card rewards, caps, expirations, and offer rules to recommend the highest-value payment method in real time. It focuses on decision optimization rather than dashboards, helping users quantify value gained versus value left on the table.
